input.text: I tried to start my iRabbit. It doesn't work. I'm very tired and angry. Sir, if you're hungry, I can call you back after lunch. No, wait. I check the rabbit. It doesn't function. Sir, please do not shake your iRabbit. Press the tail to start. I tried. It never works. I hate the rabbit. Sir, your one year limited guarantee doesn't cover chewing or biting the device. No, I hate the rabbit. Heating can cause fire in your house, Sir. No, I hate the rabbit. I understand you are a non-vegetarian, Mr Greg. But I would personally advise you to not eat the equipment, Sir.
